pages.title: Repairing Vault Gear
pages.text: Repairing $(#033dfc)Vault Gear$() requires you to apply a $(#033dfc)Repair core$() of the corresponding Gear Piece (e.g. T2 Chestplate -> T2 Repair Core) and available Repair Slots on the Gear Piece.$(br2)Upon applying, a repair slot will be consumed

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Repair Cores$() can be found inside the Vaults, prominently in $(#033dfc)God Altars$() and also crafted with Vault Resources.
